I am a highly skilled legal secretary with experience of other sectors, such as surveying, accounting and medical.

I am a mother tongue English speaker with a Masters level education and a Bachelors degree in French, including business and legal French, and am available for translation work.

I have a high-speed broadband connection and have recently doubled the memory on my computer and am equipped to handle digital dictation.

I am a highly-skilled secretary specialising in legal work with 20 years experience.& I am fast, efficient and accurate and have never had any complaints EVER about the quality of my work. I am reliable and conscientious and I get the job done with the minimum of fuss and the maximum of quality.

I am availablerom 24/7 and can fit in with your timezone. 

My typing speed is 80wpm and I will endeavour to turn your work around as quickly as possible. If you have a deadline, or the situation changes while I am working, please let me know and I will do everything in my power to meet the new timescale.

We follow a very transparent and time-tested approach for product development, which is the reason that our products are one of the best in industry. Our dedicated and efficient team enables us to develop high quality products in a reasonable time frame and cost.
We are quite flexible in our payment terms. We work on a mutually agreeable terms. However we usually take 25-40% in advance and remaining in 2-3 installments till the project deployment.

abstrac: Python, ROR, Magento,Symfony, PHP, Zend,Android, Fedex API, Android, Zoho CRM, Box API, Loyalty Reward Solution, Healthcare, Referral Systems
bio:
In just couple of years Techencephalon has grown from the fairly small group of fervent engineers to a full scale software development organization. We have in-house team of business analysts, designers, system architects, developers, project managers, testing engineers and project coordinators. Our project development methodology helps our client to observe their project status at each stage – Planning, Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Deployment.

We pride ourselves in delivering the enterprise business solutions to a range of clients across US, UK, Australia, Singapore & India. We believe in right consulting, fulfilling commitment, quality services, and awesome software support & maintenance. Our commitment & quality service generates the repeat business by our existing client.

No two business processes are identical, and so every client’s requirement must be understood correctly. We strive to gain a full understanding of our clients’ business needs prior to recommending any solutions. “ASK” is a magical word which elucidates all your doubts and we believe in asking questions to our clients to understand their business problem, business need and propose suitable business solutions.

At Techencephalon, a team of “IT Geeks” drawn from best engineering schools is working. We think differently since we do not believe in just instructions whereas we believe in suggestions. We always propose good development option to our clients. At Techencephalon, development process shows that we prefer walking in our client’s shoes. We are concerned about our client’s business needs and we always try to deliver a solution that surely enhances our client’s business.

Communication Methods Used:
- Phone -- US, UK Phone Lines
- Skype
- Google Hangout
- GotoMeeting
- Email
- FAX

Payment Terms:
- 1st Milestone (25% payment): Project Kickoff
- 2nd Milestone (25% payment): Database Design + Mockups+ Architecture Design + HTML Designs
- 3rd Milestone (25% payment): Alpha Release
- 4th Milestone (25% payment): Final Release

SLA Terms:
- All issues found in the application up to 2 months from the date of delivery of the application which are covered under the specifications will be fixed immediately without any extra charges.
- We will have a response and remedy time of 2 business days for all critical issues, and 4 business days for non-critical issues.
- Any enhancements to the application required after release would be separately estimated and billed.
- We can agree on a monthly plan to take care of any tweaks/enhancements required in the application on a regular basis.
- We can agree on a monthly plan to maintain and scale the application
